definitions: the action of building something up again; reconstruction

examples.text: the rapid reconstitution of the military fleet after an attack
a necessity for the reconstitution of law and order

shortDefinitions: action of building something up again

definitions: the action of changing the form and organization of an institution

examples.text: the reconstitution of the company brought further changes

shortDefinitions: action of changing the form and organization of institution

definitions: the process of restoring something dried to its original state by adding water to it

examples.text: water for reconstitution of dehydrated foods

shortDefinitions: process of restoring something dried to its original state by adding water to it
